verses.verse: He that dwelleth <WH3427> in the secret <WH5643> place of the most High <WH5945> shall abide <WH3885> under the shadow <WH6738> of the Almighty <WH7706>. abide: Heb. lodge
I will say <WH559> of the LORD <WH3068>, He is my refuge <WH4268> and my fortress <WH4686>: my God <WH430>; in him will I trust <WH982>.
Surely he shall deliver <WH5337> thee from the snare <WH6341> of the fowler <WH3353>, and from the noisome <WH1942> pestilence <WH1698>.
He shall cover <WH5526> thee with his feathers <WH84>, and under his wings <WH3671> shalt thou trust <WH2620>: his truth <WH571> shall be thy shield <WH6793> and buckler <WH5507>.
Thou shalt not be afraid <WH3372> for the terror <WH6343> by night <WH3915>; nor for the arrow <WH2671> that flieth <WH5774> by day <WH3119>;
Nor for the pestilence <WH1698> that walketh <WH1980> in darkness <WH652>; nor for the destruction <WH6986> that wasteth <WH7736> at noonday <WH6672>.
A thousand <WH505> shall fall <WH5307> at thy side <WH6654>, and ten thousand <WH7233> at thy right hand <WH3225>; but it shall not come nigh <WH5066> thee.
Only with thine eyes <WH5869> shalt thou behold <WH5027> and see <WH7200> the reward <WH8011> of the wicked <WH7563>.
Because thou hast made <WH7760> the LORD <WH3068>, which is my refuge <WH4268>, even the most High <WH5945>, thy habitation <WH4583>;
There shall no evil <WH7451> befall <WH579> thee, neither shall any plague <WH5061> come nigh <WH7126> thy dwelling <WH168>.
For he shall give his angels <WH4397> charge <WH6680> over thee, to keep <WH8104> thee in all thy ways <WH1870>.
They shall bear thee up <WH5375> in their hands <WH3709>, lest thou dash <WH5062> thy foot <WH7272> against a stone <WH68>.
Thou shalt tread <WH1869> upon the lion <WH7826> and adder <WH6620>: the young lion <WH3715> and the dragon <WH8577> shalt thou trample under feet <WH7429>. adder: or, asp
Because he hath set his love <WH2836> upon me, therefore will I deliver <WH6403> him: I will set him on high <WH7682>, because he hath known <WH3045> my name <WH8034>.
He shall call <WH7121> upon me, and I will answer <WH6030> him: I will be with him in trouble <WH6869>; I will deliver <WH2502> him, and honour <WH3513> him.
With long <WH753> life <WH3117> will I satisfy <WH7646> him, and shew <WH7200> him my salvation <WH3444>. long: Heb. length of days
